data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Caterino, Michael S., Tishechkin, Alexey K. (2019): A revision of the Phelisterhaemorrhous species group (Coleoptera, Histeridae, Exosternini). ZooKeys 854: 41-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.854.35133, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.854.35133
